UML:TaggedValue.value: Array of MIME types allowed as output for this transformation. Leave empty, for all MIME types to be allowed. @var array(string)
ezcImageFilters object for the handler. @var ezcImageFilters
Scale up and down, as fits @var int
The handler this filter class belongs to. Set while instanciating. @var ezcImageHandler

Create a new Filters object for a handler. This class should never be instanciated directly. Objects are created by the specific handler, this class belongs to. It's just the outsourced filter callbacks of the handler {@link ezcImageHandler}. @param ezcImageHandler $handler Handler utilized by this filters.
